import React from "react"; import styles from "./ScrollComponent.module.css"; const ScrollComponent = ({ content }) => { return (
{content.map((item, index) => (
{item.hasOwnProperty("time") ? ( <>

{item.time} {item.span}

{item.text}

) : ( <>

{item.title}

{item.text}

)}
))}
); }; export default ScrollComponent;
